columns.name: GUIC_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: Internal sequence number for the item unit of measure conversion records.

columns.name: GTM_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The GID for the item that is having the item unit of measure information added, updated or removed. The item UOM conversion allows you to record multiple conversion rates and an item's unit of measurement.

columns.name: FROM_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The from unit of measure for this entry. For example if you wish to convert from pounds (LB) to kilograms (KG) the from unit of measure would be pounds.

columns.name: TO_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The to unit of measure for this entry. For example if you wish to convert from pounds (LB) to kilograms (KG) the to unit of measure would be kilograms.

columns.name: CONVERSION_RATE
columns.description: The conversion rate between the from and to unit of measure for this entry. For example if you wish to convert from pounds (LB) to kilograms (KG) the conversion rate would be - for the standard LB to KG conversion - 0.453592.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
